version_description:
+ fixed percentage formatting
+ fixed background refresh for Apple Watch & 3D Touch Quick Actions
+ new option to display cryptocurrency price on app icon badge
+ added Ethereum Classic, Lisk, Monero, DigixDAO, Steem, NEM, Monero, Waves, BitS

+ fixed percentage formatting
+ fixed background refresh for Apple Watch & 3D Touch Quick Actions
+ new option to display cryptocurrency price on app icon badge
+ added Ethereum Classic, Lisk, Monero, DigixDAO, Steem, NEM, Monero, Waves, BitS

+ added support for top 100 cryptocurrencies
+ easily switch between favorites / market cap lists
+ switch table detail (tap on percentage column)
+ updated Apple Watch app (better readability)
+ added Singapore Dollar as output currency
+

+ added support for top 100 cryptocurrencies
+ easily switch between favorites / market cap lists
+ switch table detail (tap on percentage column)
+ updated Apple Watch app (better readability)
+ added Singapore Dollar as output currency
+

+ fixed missing graphs
+ added cryptocurrency search
+ added currency calculator

+ fixed missing graphs
+ added cryptocurrency search
+ added currency calculator

+ portfolio with gain/loss calculation
+ price alerts with embedded graphs
+ support for customizable exchanges
+ improved accessibility (dynamic font size)
+ support for iPad and iPad Pro
+ dark and light modes+ portfolio with gain/loss ca

+ ready for iPhone X
+ FaceID, TouchID or passcode lock

+ lot of small bug/design fixes
